H0.text: Which bird was once called apteryx. Ostrich

H1.text: Which bird was once called apteryx. Penguin

H2.text: Which bird was once called apteryx. Emu

H3.text: Which bird was once called apteryx. Kiwi

A4.text: In 1813, George Shaw named the genus Apteryx in his species description of the southern brown kiwi, which he called 'the southern apteryx'.

A5.text: The five extant species fall into the family Apterygidae and genus Apteryx.
